thread.title: Mavs waiting on health as difficult West challenge looms
thread.title_full: Mavs waiting on health as difficult West challenge looms

title: Mavs waiting on health as difficult West challenge looms
text:
> Top News Mavs waiting on health as difficult West challenge looms Dallas Mavericks guard John Jenkins (12) drives past Oklahoma City Thunder guard D.J. Augustin, left, in the third quarter of an NBA basketball preseason game in Tulsa, Okla.,Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015. Oklahoma City won 100-88.
